parameters.name: block_id
parameters.description: The ID of the block to delete.

403.description: Forbidden - Integration lacks update content capabilities

404.description: Block not found or integration does not have access

delete.description:
Sets a Block object, including page blocks, to archived: true using the specified ID. In the Notion UI, this moves the block to the "Trash" where it can still be accessed and restored.

To restore the block, use the Update a block or Update page APIs respectively.

This endpoint requires the integration to have update content capabilities. Attempting to call this API without update content capabilities will return an HTTP 403 response.

Returns 404 if the block doesn't exist, or if the integration doesn't have access to the block.

Returns 400 or 429 if the request exceeds the request limits.
